Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
The edit properties dialog (see Figure [properties_dialog]) shows the values of properties

  • in black if they are set directly on the resource for which the properties are shown in the dialog
  • in italics and gray if the value is inherited.

For inherited values of properties you get information on where these values are set by hovering over the little "info"-icons.

Except for the "Basic Properties" tab, all properties shown are grouped into "Used Properties" and "Unused Properties". Open the "Unused Properties" group to set the value of a property that has not yet any directly set nor inherited value.

The dialog also allows you to add new propertiesThat means, properties that are not set on any other resource in the VFS. To do this, click the gear wheel in the lower left corner of the dialog.
